definition[0]: very large companies, considered as a powerful group with a lot of influence
definition[1]: a product or type of activity that people spend a lot of money on
definition[2]: very large companies considered as a powerful group with a lot of influence
example[1]: Reformers are trying to cut the links between government and big business.
definition[3]: a product or activity where a lot of money is involved
example[3]: Trafficking in stolen cars has become big business across eastern Europe.
